channel.title: Hp bar problem with players
channel.description: ok so i changed my max stats to a high level and now the hp bar is messed up. it doese the same thing the npc hp bar used to but i fixed it with this tut http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/62427-npc-hp-bar-fix-stop-repeatedly-refilling.html and i was looking on how to do it for reg players. any idea?

item.title: Hp bar problem with players
item.dc:creator: @deathbyu deathbyu
item.description:
@deathbyu wrote:

ok so i changed my max stats to a high level and now the hp bar is messed up. it doese the same thing the npc hp bar used to but i fixed it with this tut http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/62427-npc-hp-bar-fix-stop-repeatedly-refilling.html and i was looking on how to do it for reg players. any idea?
